metadata.Title: CVE-2021-41687 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low.
metadata.Description:
DCMTK through 3.6.6 does not handle memory free properly. The program malloc a heap memory for parsing data, but does not free it when error in parsing. Sending specific requests to the dcmqrdb program incur the memory leak. An attacker can use it to launch a DoS attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-41687` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dcmtk - 3.6.7-5
libdcmtk17 - 3.6.7-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dcmtk package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.7-5').
